title: T-cell activation. Two for T.
summary: T-cell activation requires costimulation in addition to the antigen-specific signal. Recent results suggest that distinct costimulatory molecules can specifically activate different types of T-cell response....
abstract: T-cell activation requires costimulation in addition to the antigen-specific signal. Recent results suggest that distinct costimulatory molecules can specifically activate different types of T-cell response.
